summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingIGK's Good Behavior all-in-one prep spray gently detangles, provides 450Â° heat protection, fights frizz for 24 hours, and adds shine.
details: DetailsBenefits450Â°F Heat ProtectionKey IngredientsCoconut Oil: Enhances shine and detanglesFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfates (SLS or SLES)PetrolatumMineral OilItem 2568607How To UseApply evenly to damp, clean hair before your styler Comb through Blow dry or style as desired TIP: For the perfect frizz-free blowout that lasts, apply Good Behavior Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray (sold separately).IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Silicone Quaternium-8, Spirulina Maxima Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Panthenol, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Sambucus Nigra Flower Water, Glycolic Acid, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Trideceth-10, Potassium Sorbate, Polyquaternium-59, Cetrimonium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Cystine Bis-Pg-Propyl Silanetriol, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Citric Acid, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply evenly to damp, clean hair before your styler Comb through Blow dry or style as desired TIP: For the perfect frizz-free blowout that lasts, apply Good Behavior Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray (sold separately).

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy it again !!!!
reviews.comments: My first time trying it and it did give luster, softness, smoothness, and shine, and I only wash my hair once a week and it last for the whole seven days

reviews.headline: This product did not do what it said it would do.
reviews.comments: Did not do what it says it would do.

reviews.headline: Uuummmm no.
reviews.comments: I tried this because they were out of Matrix but it left my hair super dry, frizzy, and brittle. Can't wait to switch back to Matrix.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Helps smoothing my hair!

reviews.headline: Great hair support
reviews.comments: I feel like my hair is well supported from heat and frizz with this product.

reviews.headline: I love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I singed my bleached bangs and needed help. Sales associate recommended this product. It works wonders as a heat protectant makes my hair so soft. I will buy the full size next time.

reviews.headline: Went to long without it.
reviews.comments: Kept trying other products when I should  have just stuck with what always worked.   Love it.   Will not do that again.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Smells like cucumberâ€¦.. but works wonderful on my hair. Usually I have to spent 2-3 minutes to brush my detangled hair, but with this spay it takes me 30 seconds and I'm done ! Definetly will buy again.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Smells like cucumberâ€¦.. but works wonderful on my hair. Usually I have to spent 2-3 minutes to brush my detangled hair, but with this spay it takes me 30 seconds and I'm done ! Definetly will buy again.

reviews.headline: Yes I love this product
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Defective
reviews.comments: After using the product for a few months it all of a sudden changed consistency from spray to a gel. Cannot use it with the spray bottle anymore, it just settled on the bottom of the bottle. I continued to use it and now i have breakage. Very disappointed. I contacted the company and they said they couldn't do anything because I purchased from Ulta and not directly from them.

reviews.headline: This brand is so underrated
reviews.comments: I recieved a mini spray for my birthday gift last year and i had to buy it for myself. Leaves hair so soft and shiny. Also does a great job of deranglinf my 3 ft long hair. The signature IGK scent is also a plus!

reviews.headline: Nope! The smell is awful
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this so much. The reviews said this product does everything I was looking for, but I couldn't tolerate the smell. In fact, it is such a strong chemical smell, it seems toxic to breath.

reviews.headline: Worth the money!
reviews.comments: I have repurchased this product multiple times because of the fact that it always makes my hair smell heavenly, leaves a great shine effect, and reduced my frizz almost completely! I have low porosity hair and I treat this prep spray as a leave-in conditioner. Absolutely no leftover residue to where my hair feels greasy or weighed down. Perfect for air-drying or heat tools!

reviews.headline: Great stuff
reviews.comments: Pricey but worth it smells great tangles gone and makes your hair shiney

reviews.headline: Worked great on my fine bleached hair
reviews.comments: Got this because my hairstylist recommended it. It doesn't seem super moisturizing at first, I used probably  10-11 sprays and only use 6-7 with Unite 7Seconds, but it worked well and didn't weigh my hair down. Now that it's dry it's also shiny!

reviews.headline: WORTH IT!
reviews.comments: I just purchased the BIGGEST size b/c I went through the travel size so quickly. I use this spray on my hair before I blow dry. I spray about 3-5 pumps, blow dry, then straighten. My hair feels amazing when I'm done. Smooth and smells amazing.GET IT

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.comments: THIS WORKS SO WELL TO CONTROL FRIZZ!!

reviews.headline: SAVE YOUR MONEY
reviews.comments: Absolutely the worst heat protect ive tried, makes your hair feel dry, brittle and frizzy. The smell is also awful. Please dont waste your money. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

reviews.headline: This is my go to product
reviews.comments: This is the greatest product. My hair remains soft, shiny and healthy looking for many days. My friend uses this product as well She has thick wavy hair and loves it too!

media.headline: In love with this 4-1 Prep Spray!
media.caption: Good Behavior 4-in-1 Prep Spray

media.headline: I loved this product, I would use it again, it leaves your h

faceoff_positive.comments: Voxbox gave me this product completely to try and review and I'm obsessed it so versatile. You can use this hair product as a detangler, for you and your kids. It's has a heat protectant for you hair so while blow dryer or other hair styling tools you will not fry your hair and because you not frying you hair, it won't fall out all over the house or in the shower or in you hair brush. I started noticing in the shower I wasn't loosing nearly as much hair as before. The smell of this hair product Is divine. NOT over powering and very subtle. It just smell beautiful. You have to really go looking for the smell to notice it. My favorite part of this product is it WEIGHTLESS !!!!! You can go crazy spraying this all over your wet hair and it will not weight down your hair. It's amazing I can't stop using it. You can spray your roots, mid section, and crown / top of you hair and go crazy but, you will not feel this product in you hair when your done blow drying and stying your hair.I recommend this product. You won't regret it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Obsessed with IGK.

faceoff_negative.comments: Extremely Lightweight, huge plus that i didn't find in Chi or it's a 10. I don't find it makes my hair crunchy like my shea moisture products do sometimes (if i over do it) and they're not protectants. It does a better job at detangling than my sheas do, BUT could be better. I wasn't a fan of the smell, but my bf liked it. That's saying something. I did get used to it and the smell stayed in my hair which hear protectants NEVER do! So if you like the smell I'd say it's a win for you. Price i would say is ok... there are other expensive ones but they are creams which may be heavy or smell may not last. I would buy if i liked the smell! I love that it's basically perfume for your hair with heat protectant and detangler, this is where my review is mostly coming from. I was gifted this complementary. I see that bumble and bumble protects from UV so... kinda would want that too.
faceoff_negative.headline: Lightweight, love the lasting smell, don't love the scent
